<s>[INST] Crea un muro de 5 metros de largo y 3 metros de alto. [/INST]Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
WallType wallType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).FirstOrDefault() as WallType;

{
    Line line = Line.CreateBound(XYZ.Zero, new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(5, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0, 0));
    Wall.Create(doc, line, wallType.Id, level.Id, UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(3, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0.0, false, false);
}</s>

<s>[INST] Inserta una ventana de 1 metro de ancho y 1.2 metros de alto en un muro, creando un nuevo tipo si es necesario. [/INST]Wall hostWall = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).FirstOrDefault() as Wall;
FamilySymbol originalSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Windows).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;

if (originalSymbol != null && hostWall != null)
{
    // Duplica el tipo para no modificar el original
    string newTypeName = $"Window 1.0m x 1.2m - {Guid.NewGuid().ToString().Substring(0, 4)}";
    FamilySymbol newSymbol = originalSymbol.Duplicate(newTypeName) as FamilySymbol;

    // Activa el nuevo tipo si no lo está
    if (!newSymbol.IsActive)
    {
        newSymbol.Activate();
    }

    // Establece las dimensiones en el nuevo tipo
    Parameter widthParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Width");
    if(widthParam != null) widthParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(1.0, UnitTypeId.Meters));

    Parameter heightParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Height");
    if(heightParam != null) heightParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(1.2, UnitTypeId.Meters));

    // Obtén la información necesaria para la inserción
    Level level = doc.GetElement(hostWall.LevelId) as Level;
    LocationCurve locationCurve = hostWall.Location as LocationCurve;
    if (locationCurve != null)
    {
        XYZ insertionPoint = locationCurve.Curve.Evaluate(0.5, true);
        // Inserta una instancia del NUEVO tipo
        doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(insertionPoint, newSymbol, hostWall, level, StructuralType.NonStructural);
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Insert a window 1m wide and 1.2m high into a wall. [/INST]FamilySymbol originalSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Windows).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;
Wall hostWall = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).FirstOrDefault() as Wall;

if (originalSymbol != null && hostWall != null)
{
    // Duplica el tipo para no modificar el original y asegura un nombre único
    string newTypeName = $"Window {UnitUtils.ConvertFromInternalUnits(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(1.0, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitTypeId.Meters)}m x {UnitUtils.ConvertFromInternalUnits(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(1.2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitTypeId.Meters)}m - {Guid.NewGuid().ToString().Substring(0, 4)}";
    FamilySymbol newSymbol = originalSymbol.Duplicate(newTypeName) as FamilySymbol;

    if (!newSymbol.IsActive)
    {
        newSymbol.Activate();
    }

    // Establece las dimensiones en el nuevo tipo
    Parameter widthParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Width");
    Parameter heightParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Height");

    if (widthParam != null && heightParam != null)
    {
        widthParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(1.0, UnitTypeId.Meters));
        heightParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(1.2, UnitTypeId.Meters));
    }

    Level level = doc.GetElement(hostWall.LevelId) as Level;
    LocationCurve locationCurve = hostWall.Location as LocationCurve;
    if (level != null && locationCurve != null)
    {
        XYZ insertionPoint = locationCurve.Curve.Evaluate(0.5, true);
        doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(insertionPoint, newSymbol, hostWall, level, StructuralType.NonStructural);
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Genera un piso rectangular de 10×8 metros. [/INST]Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
FloorType floorType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(FloorType)).FirstOrDefault() as FloorType;

if (level != null && floorType != null)
{
    double width = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters);
    double length = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(8, UnitTypeId.Meters);
    CurveLoop loop = new CurveLoop();
    loop.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0,0,0), new XYZ(width,0,0)));
    loop.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(width,0,0), new XYZ(width,length,0)));
    loop.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(width,length,0), new XYZ(0,length,0)));
    loop.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0,length,0), new XYZ(0,0,0)));
    Floor.Create(doc, new List<CurveLoop> { loop }, floorType.Id, level.Id);
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea columnas en cada intersección de ejes. [/INST]FamilySymbol colSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralColumns).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;
Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
List<Grid> grids = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Grid)).Cast<Grid>().ToList();

if (colSymbol != null && level != null && grids.Count >= 2)
{
    for (int i = 0; i < grids.Count; i++)
    {
        for (int j = i + 1; j < grids.Count; j++)
        {
            IntersectionResultArray results = null;
            grids[i].Curve.Intersect(grids[j].Curve, out results);
            if(results != null)
            {
                 foreach (IntersectionResult ir in results)
                 {
                     doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(ir.XYZPoint, colSymbol, level, StructuralType.Column);
                 }
            }
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea vigas entre las columnas alineadas horizontalmente. [/INST]FamilySymbol beamSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralFraming).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;
Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
List<FamilyInstance> columns = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralColumns).WhereElementIsNotElementType().Cast<FamilyInstance>().OrderBy(c => c.GetTransform().Origin.Y).ThenBy(c => c.GetTransform().Origin.X).ToList();

if (beamSymbol != null && level != null && columns.Count >= 2)
{
    for(int i=0; i < columns.Count - 1; i++)
    {
        LocationPoint p1 = columns[i].Location as LocationPoint;
        LocationPoint p2 = columns[i+1].Location as LocationPoint;
        if (p1 != null && p2 != null && Math.Abs(p1.Point.Y - p2.Point.Y) < 0.01)
        {
            Line line = Line.CreateBound(p1.Point, p2.Point);
            doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(line, beamSymbol, level, StructuralType.Beam);
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Acota la longitud de un muro seleccionado por el usuario. [/INST]UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
Reference wallRef = uidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un muro para acotar");

if (wallRef != null)
{
    Wall wall = doc.GetElement(wallRef) as Wall;
    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;

    if (wall != null && activeView != null)
    {
        LocationCurve locCurve = wall.Location as LocationCurve;
        if (locCurve != null)
        {
            Line wallLine = locCurve.Curve as Line;
            if (wallLine != null)
            {
                ReferenceArray refs = new ReferenceArray();
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(0));
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(1));
                XYZ pt1 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(0).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                XYZ pt2 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(1).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                Line dimLine = Line.CreateBound(pt1, pt2);
                doc.Create.NewDimension(activeView, dimLine, refs);
            }
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una puerta de 0.9m de ancho y 2.1m de alto en el muro. [/INST]Wall hostWall = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).FirstOrDefault() as Wall;

    FamilySymbol newSymbol = originalSymbol.Duplicate(newTypeName) as FamilySymbol;

    if (!newSymbol.IsActive)
    {
        newSymbol.Activate();
    }

    // Establece las dimensiones en el nuevo tipo
    Parameter widthParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Width");
    Parameter heightParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Height");

    if (widthParam != null && heightParam != null)
    {
        widthParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(0.9, UnitTypeId.Meters));
        heightParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(2.1, UnitTypeId.Meters));
    }

    Level level = doc.GetElement(hostWall.LevelId) as Level;

    if (level != null && locationCurve != null)
    {
        XYZ insertionPoint = locationCurve.Curve.Evaluate(0.5, true);
        doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(insertionPoint, newSymbol, hostWall, level, StructuralType.NonStructural);
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Insert a window 1m wide and 1.2m high into a wall. [/INST]FamilySymbol originalSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Windows).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;
Wall hostWall = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).FirstOrDefault() as Wall;

if (originalSymbol != null && hostWall != null)
{
    // Duplica el tipo para no modificar el original y asegura un nombre único
    string newTypeName = $"Window {UnitUtils.ConvertFromInternalUnits(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(1.0, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitTypeId.Meters)}m x {UnitUtils.ConvertFromInternalUnits(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(1.2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitTypeId.Meters)}m - {Guid.NewGuid().ToString().Substring(0, 4)}";
    FamilySymbol newSymbol = originalSymbol.Duplicate(newTypeName) as FamilySymbol;

    if (!newSymbol.IsActive)
    {
        newSymbol.Activate();
    }

    // Establece las dimensiones en el nuevo tipo
    Parameter widthParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Width");
    Parameter heightParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Height");

    if (widthParam != null && heightParam != null)
    {
        widthParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(1.0, UnitTypeId.Meters));
        heightParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(1.2, UnitTypeId.Meters));
    }

    Level level = doc.GetElement(hostWall.LevelId) as Level;
    LocationCurve locationCurve = hostWall.Location as LocationCurve;
    if (level != null && locationCurve != null)
    {
        XYZ insertionPoint = locationCurve.Curve.Evaluate(0.5, true);
        doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(insertionPoint, newSymbol, hostWall, level, StructuralType.NonStructural);
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea columnas en cada intersección de ejes. [/INST]FamilySymbol colSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralColumns).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;
Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
List<Grid> grids = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Grid)).Cast<Grid>().ToList();

if (colSymbol != null && level != null && grids.Count >= 2)
{
    for (int i = 0; i < grids.Count; i++)
    {
        for (int j = i + 1; j < grids.Count; j++)
        {
            IntersectionResultArray results = null;
            grids[i].Curve.Intersect(grids[j].Curve, out results);
            if(results != null)
            {
                 foreach (IntersectionResult ir in results)
                 {
                     doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(ir.XYZPoint, colSymbol, level, StructuralType.Column);
                 }
            }
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea vigas entre las columnas alineadas horizontalmente. [/INST]FamilySymbol beamSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralFraming).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;
Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
List<FamilyInstance> columns = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralColumns).WhereElementIsNotElementType().Cast<FamilyInstance>().OrderBy(c => c.GetTransform().Origin.Y).ThenBy(c => c.GetTransform().Origin.X).ToList();

if (beamSymbol != null && level != null && columns.Count >= 2)
{
    for(int i=0; i < columns.Count - 1; i++)
    {
        LocationPoint p1 = columns[i].Location as LocationPoint;
        LocationPoint p2 = columns[i+1].Location as LocationPoint;
        if (p1 != null && p2 != null && Math.Abs(p1.Point.Y - p2.Point.Y) < 0.01)
        {
            Line line = Line.CreateBound(p1.Point, p2.Point);
            doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(line, beamSymbol, level, StructuralType.Beam);
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Acota la longitud de un muro seleccionado por el usuario. [/INST]UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
Reference wallRef = uidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un muro para acotar");

if (wallRef != null)
{
    Wall wall = doc.GetElement(wallRef) as Wall;
    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;

    if (wall != null && activeView != null)
    {
        LocationCurve locCurve = wall.Location as LocationCurve;
        if (locCurve != null)
        {
            Line wallLine = locCurve.Curve as Line;
            if (wallLine != null)
            {
                ReferenceArray refs = new ReferenceArray();
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(0));
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(1));
                XYZ pt1 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(0).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                XYZ pt2 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(1).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                Line dimLine = Line.CreateBound(pt1, pt2);
                doc.Create.NewDimension(activeView, dimLine, refs);
            }
        }
    }
}</s>

        {
            Line wallLine = locCurve.Curve as Line;
            if (wallLine != null)
            {
                ReferenceArray refs = new ReferenceArray();
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(0));
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(1));
                XYZ pt1 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(0).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                XYZ pt2 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(1).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                Line dimLine = Line.CreateBound(pt1, pt2);
                doc.Create.NewDimension(activeView, dimLine, refs);
            }
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un nuevo tipo de muro de 25cm llamado 'Muro Estructural 25cm'. [/INST]string newTypeName = "Muro Estructural 25cm";
WallType wallTypeToDuplicate = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).FirstOrDefault() as WallType;

if (wallTypeToDuplicate != null)
{
    WallType newWallType = wallTypeToDuplicate.Duplicate(newTypeName) as WallType;
    if (newWallType != null)
    {
        CompoundStructure cs = newWallType.GetCompoundStructure();
        int coreLayerIndex = cs.GetFirstCoreLayerIndex();
        cs.SetLayerFunction(coreLayerIndex, MaterialFunctionAssignment.Structure);
        cs.SetLayerWidth(coreLayerIndex, UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(0.25, UnitTypeId.Meters));
        newWallType.SetCompoundStructure(cs);
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Modela un plafón a 2.8 metros de altura en Nivel 1. [/INST]CeilingType ceilingType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(CeilingType)).FirstOrDefault() as CeilingType;

{
    CurveLoop profile = new CurveLoop();
    profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0,0,0), new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),0,0)));
    profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),0,0), new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),0)));
    profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),0), new XYZ(0,UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),0)));
    profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0,UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),0), new XYZ(0,0,0)));

    Ceiling ceiling = Ceiling.Create(doc, new List<CurveLoop>{profile}, ceilingType.Id, level.Id);
    if (ceiling != null)
    {
        Parameter heightParam = ceiling.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.CEILING_HEIGHTABOVELEVEL_PARAM);
        if (heightParam != null && !heightParam.IsReadOnly) heightParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(2.8, UnitTypeId.Meters));
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un DirectShape con forma de caja de 2x2x2 metros. [/INST]TessellatedShapeBuilder builder = new TessellatedShapeBuilder();
builder.OpenConnectedFaceSet(true);
double size = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(2, UnitTypeId.Meters);
XYZ p0=new XYZ(0,0,0); XYZ p1=new XYZ(size,0,0); XYZ p2=new XYZ(size,size,0); XYZ p3=new XYZ(0,size,0);
XYZ p4=new XYZ(0,0,size); XYZ p5=new XYZ(size,0,size); XYZ p6=new XYZ(size,size,size); XYZ p7=new XYZ(0,size,size);
builder.AddFace(new TessellatedFace(new List<XYZ>{p0,p1,p2,p3}, ElementId.InvalidElementId));
builder.AddFace(new TessellatedFace(new List<XYZ>{p7,p6,p5,p4}, ElementId.InvalidElementId));
builder.AddFace(new TessellatedFace(new List<XYZ>{p0,p4,p5,p1}, ElementId.InvalidElementId));
builder.AddFace(new TessellatedFace(new List<XYZ>{p1,p5,p6,p2}, ElementId.InvalidElementId));
builder.AddFace(new TessellatedFace(new List<XYZ>{p2,p6,p7,p3}, ElementId.InvalidElementId));
builder.AddFace(new TessellatedFace(new List<XYZ>{p3,p7,p4,p0}, ElementId.InvalidElementId));
builder.CloseConnectedFaceSet();
builder.Build();
TessellatedShapeBuilderResult result = builder.GetBuildResult();
DirectShape ds = DirectShape.CreateElement(doc, new ElementId(BuiltInCategory.OST_GenericModel));

if (ds != null)
{
    ds.SetShape(result.GetGeometricalObjects());
    ds.Name = "Caja DirectShape";
}</s>

<s>[INST] Create a DirectShape with a 2x2x2 meter box shape. [/INST]TessellatedShapeBuilder builder = new TessellatedShapeBuilder();

XYZ p4=new XYZ(0,0,size); XYZ p5=new XYZ(size,0,size); XYZ p6=new XYZ(size,size,size); XYZ p7=new XYZ(0,size,size);
builder.AddFace(new TessellatedFace(new List<XYZ>{p0,p1,p2,p3}, ElementId.InvalidElementId));
builder.AddFace(new TessellatedFace(new List<XYZ>{p7,p6,p5,p4}, ElementId.InvalidElementId));
builder.AddFace(new TessellatedFace(new List<XYZ>{p0,p4,p5,p1}, ElementId.InvalidElementId));
builder.AddFace(new TessellatedFace(new List<XYZ>{p1,p5,p6,p2}, ElementId.InvalidElementId));
builder.AddFace(new TessellatedFace(new List<XYZ>{p2,p6,p7,p3}, ElementId.InvalidElementId));
builder.AddFace(new TessellatedFace(new List<XYZ>{p3,p7,p4,p0}, ElementId.InvalidElementId));
builder.CloseConnectedFaceSet();
builder.Build();
TessellatedShapeBuilderResult result = builder.GetBuildResult();
DirectShape ds = DirectShape.CreateElement(doc, new ElementId(BuiltInCategory.OST_GenericModel));

if (ds != null)
{
    ds.SetShape(result.GetGeometricalObjects());

}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una nueva vista 3D orientada desde el punto (10,10,10) mirando hacia el origen. [/INST]ViewFamilyType vft = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewFamilyType)).Cast<ViewFamilyType>().FirstOrDefault(v=>v.ViewFamily==ViewFamily.ThreeDimensional);

if (vft != null)
{
    View3D view = View3D.CreateIsometric(doc, vft.Id);
    if (view != null)
    {
        XYZ eyePos = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters));
        XYZ upDir = XYZ.BasisZ;
        XYZ forwardDir = XYZ.Zero - eyePos;
        ViewOrientation3D vo = new ViewOrientation3D(eyePos, upDir, forwardDir);
        view.SetOrientation(vo);
        view.Name = "Vista desde (10,10,10)";
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Obtén la geometría sólida de un elemento seleccionado. [/INST]UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
Reference pickedRef = uidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un elemento para obtener su geometría");

List<Solid> solids = new List<Solid>();
if (pickedRef != null)
{
    Element elem = doc.GetElement(pickedRef);
    if (elem != null)
    {
        Options opt = new Options() { ComputeReferences = true, DetailLevel = ViewDetailLevel.Fine };
        GeometryElement geoElem = elem.get_Geometry(opt);
        if (geoElem != null)
        {
            solids = geoElem.OfType<Solid>().Where(s => s.Volume > 0).ToList();
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Cambia el tipo de todas las ventanas de 'Fijo' a 'Abatible'. [/INST]FamilySymbol newType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Windows).WhereElementIsElementType().Cast<FamilySymbol>().FirstOrDefault(fs => fs.Name.Contains("Abatible"));
FamilySymbol oldType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Windows).WhereElementIsElementType().Cast<FamilySymbol>().FirstOrDefault(fs => fs.Name.Contains("Fijo"));

{
    List<FamilyInstance> windowsToChange = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Windows).WhereElementIsNotElementType().Cast<FamilyInstance>().Where(fi => fi.Symbol.Id == oldType.Id).ToList();

<s>[INST] Rota el elemento dado 45 grados alrededor de su centro. [/INST]UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
Reference pickedRef = uidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un elemento para rotar");

if (pickedRef != null)
{
    Element elem = doc.GetElement(pickedRef.ElementId);
    if (elem != null)
    {
        LocationPoint lp = elem.Location as LocationPoint;
        if (lp != null)
        {
            Line axis = Line.CreateBound(lp.Point, lp.Point + XYZ.BasisZ);
            double angle = 45 * Math.PI / 180.0;
            ElementTransformUtils.RotateElement(doc, elem.Id, axis, angle);
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Obtén todos los muros de un modelo vinculado que se cruzan con una caja de delimitación. [/INST]RevitLinkInstance linkInstance = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(RevitLinkInstance)).FirstOrDefault() as RevitLinkInstance;
List<Element> linkedWalls = new List<Element>();

if (linkInstance != null)
{
    Document linkDoc = linkInstance.GetLinkDocument();
    if (linkDoc != null)
    {
        BoundingBoxXYZ bbox = new BoundingBoxXYZ();
        bbox.Min = new XYZ(0,0,0);
        bbox.Max = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(50, UnitTypeId.Meters),UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(50, UnitTypeId.Meters),UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters));
        BoundingBoxIntersectsFilter filter = new BoundingBoxIntersectsFilter(new Outline(bbox.Min, bbox.Max));
        linkedWalls = new FilteredElementCollector(linkDoc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).WherePasses(filter).ToList();
    }
}
</s>

        BoundingBoxIntersectsFilter filter = new BoundingBoxIntersectsFilter(new Outline(bbox.Min, bbox.Max));

<s>[INST] Oculta todos los muros que sean más cortos de 2 metros. [/INST]double lengthThreshold = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(2, UnitTypeId.Meters);
List<Wall> walls = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).WhereElementIsNotElementType().Cast<Wall>().ToList();
List<ElementId> shortWallIds = new List<ElementId>();
View activeView = doc.ActiveView;

if (activeView != null)
{
    foreach(Wall wall in walls)
    {
        Parameter lengthParam = wall.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.CURVE_ELEM_LENGTH);
        if(lengthParam != null && lengthParam.HasValue && lengthParam.AsDouble() < lengthThreshold)
        {
            shortWallIds.Add(wall.Id);
        }
    }
    if (shortWallIds.Count > 0)
    {
        activeView.HideElements(shortWallIds);
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una vista de sección entre los puntos (0,0,0) y (10,10,0). [/INST]ViewFamilyType vft = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewFamilyType)).Cast<ViewFamilyType>().FirstOrDefault(v => v.ViewFamily == ViewFamily.Section);

if (vft != null)
{
    XYZ p1 = new XYZ(0,0,0);
    XYZ p2 = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),0);
    XYZ midPoint = (p1 + p2) / 2;
    XYZ direction = (p2 - p1).Normalize();
    XYZ up = XYZ.BasisZ;
    XYZ viewdir = up.CrossProduct(direction);
    
    BoundingBoxXYZ sectionBox = new BoundingBoxXYZ();
    Transform t = Transform.Identity;
    t.Origin = midPoint;
t.BasisX = direction;
t.BasisY = up;
t.BasisZ = viewdir;
sectionBox.Transform = t;
sectionBox.Min = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-10, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0);
sectionBox.Max = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(20, UnitTypeId.Meters));
    
    ViewSection.CreateSection(doc, vft.Id, sectionBox);
}</s>

    Transform t = Transform.Identity;

t.BasisX = direction;
t.BasisY = up;
t.BasisZ = viewdir;
sectionBox.Transform = t;
sectionBox.Min = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-10, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0);
sectionBox.Max = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(20, UnitTypeId.Meters));
    
    ViewSection.CreateSection(doc, vft.Id, sectionBox);

<s>[INST] Aplica aislamiento térmico de 25mm a todas las tuberías de agua caliente. [/INST]PipeInsulationType insulationType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(PipeInsulationType)).FirstOrDefault() as PipeInsulationType;
PipingSystemType hotWaterSystem = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(PipingSystemType)).Cast<PipingSystemType>().FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name.Contains("Hot Water") || s.Name.Contains("Agua Caliente"));

if (insulationType != null && hotWaterSystem != null)
{
    List<Pipe> pipes = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Pipe)).Cast<Pipe>().Where(p => 
    {
        Parameter systemParam = p.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.RBS_PIPING_SYSTEM_TYPE_PARAM);
        return systemParam != null && systemParam.HasValue && systemParam.AsElementId() == hotWaterSystem.Id;
    }).ToList();
    
    foreach(Pipe p in pipes)
    {
        PipeInsulation.Create(doc, p.Id, insulationType.Id, UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(25, UnitTypeId.Millimeters));
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una viga estructural entre (0,0,3) y (5,0,3) en el Nivel 2. [/INST]FamilySymbol beamType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralFraming).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;

<s>[INST] Crea una vista de sección entre los puntos (0,0,0) y (10,10,0). [/INST]ViewFamilyType vft = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewFamilyType)).Cast<ViewFamilyType>().FirstOrDefault(v => v.ViewFamily == ViewFamily.Section);

if (vft != null)
{
    XYZ p1 = new XYZ(0,0,0);
    XYZ p2 = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),0);
    XYZ midPoint = (p1 + p2) / 2;
    XYZ direction = (p2 - p1).Normalize();
    XYZ up = XYZ.BasisZ;
    XYZ viewdir = up.CrossProduct(direction);
    
    BoundingBoxXYZ sectionBox = new BoundingBoxXYZ();
    Transform t = Transform.Identity;
    t.Origin = midPoint;
t.BasisX = direction;
t.BasisY = up;
t.BasisZ = viewdir;
sectionBox.Transform = t;
sectionBox.Min = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-10, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0);
sectionBox.Max = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(20, UnitTypeId.Meters));
    
    ViewSection.CreateSection(doc, vft.Id, sectionBox);
}</s>

t.BasisZ = viewdir;

}</s>

<s>[INST] Aplica aislamiento térmico de 25mm a todas las tuberías de agua caliente. [/INST]PipeInsulationType insulationType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(PipeInsulationType)).FirstOrDefault() as PipeInsulationType;
PipingSystemType hotWaterSystem = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(PipingSystemType)).Cast<PipingSystemType>().FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name.Contains("Hot Water") || s.Name.Contains("Agua Caliente"));

if (insulationType != null && hotWaterSystem != null)
{
    List<Pipe> pipes = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Pipe)).Cast<Pipe>().Where(p => 
    {
        Parameter systemParam = p.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.RBS_PIPING_SYSTEM_TYPE_PARAM);
        return systemParam != null && systemParam.HasValue && systemParam.AsElementId() == hotWaterSystem.Id;
    }).ToList();
    
    foreach(Pipe p in pipes)
    {
        PipeInsulation.Create(doc, p.Id, insulationType.Id, UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(25, UnitTypeId.Millimeters));
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una vista de sección entre los puntos (0,0,0) y (10,10,0). [/INST]ViewFamilyType vft = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewFamilyType)).Cast<ViewFamilyType>().FirstOrDefault(v => v.ViewFamily == ViewFamily.Section);

if (vft != null)
{
    XYZ p1 = new XYZ(0,0,0);
    XYZ p2 = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters),0);
    XYZ midPoint = (p1 + p2) / 2;
    XYZ direction = (p2 - p1).Normalize();
    XYZ up = XYZ.BasisZ;
    XYZ viewdir = up.CrossProduct(direction);
    
    BoundingBoxXYZ sectionBox = new BoundingBoxXYZ();
    Transform t = Transform.Identity;
    t.Origin = midPoint;
t.BasisX = direction;
t.BasisY = up;
t.BasisZ = viewdir;
sectionBox.Transform = t;
sectionBox.Min = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-10, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0);
sectionBox.Max = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(20, UnitTypeId.Meters));
    
    ViewSection.CreateSection(doc, vft.Id, sectionBox);
}</s>

<s>[INST] Coloca postes de iluminación cada 10m en un camino de 100m. [/INST]FamilySymbol lightSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_LightingFixtures).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name.Contains("Post") || s.Name.Contains("Pole")) as FamilySymbol;

    }

<s>[INST] Crea una nueva tabla de planificación para ventanas que incluya Marca de Tipo, Ancho y Alto. [/INST]string scheduleName = "Tabla de Ventanas";

{
    schedule.Name = scheduleName;
    ScheduleDefinition def = schedule.Definition;
    if (def != null)
    {
        SchedulableField typeMarkField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.ALL_MODEL_TYPE_MARK);
        SchedulableField widthField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.FAMILY_WIDTH_PARAM);
        SchedulableField heightField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.FAMILY_HEIGHT_PARAM);
        
        if (typeMarkField != null) def.AddField(typeMarkField);
        if (widthField != null) def.AddField(widthField);
        if (heightField != null) def.AddField(heightField);
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un grupo de detalles con los elementos de detalle seleccionados. [/INST]UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
ICollection<ElementId> selectedIds = uidoc.Selection.GetElementIds();

if (selectedIds != null && selectedIds.Count > 0)
{
    List<ElementId> detailIds = new List<ElementId>();
    foreach(ElementId id in selectedIds)
    {
        Element elem = doc.GetElement(id);
        if (elem != null && elem.Category != null && elem.Category.CategoryType == CategoryType.Annotation)
        {
            detailIds.Add(id);
        }
    }

    if (detailIds.Count > 0)
    {
        Group group = doc.Create.NewGroup(detailIds);
        if (group != null)
        {
            group.Name = "Detalle Típico 1";
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una nueva tabla de planificación para ventanas que incluya Marca de Tipo, Ancho y Alto. [/INST]string scheduleName = "Tabla de Ventanas";
ViewSchedule schedule = ViewSchedule.CreateSchedule(doc, new ElementId(BuiltInCategory.OST_Windows));

if (schedule != null)
{
    schedule.Name = scheduleName;
    ScheduleDefinition def = schedule.Definition;
    if (def != null)
    {
        SchedulableField typeMarkField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.ALL_MODEL_TYPE_MARK);
        SchedulableField widthField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.FAMILY_WIDTH_PARAM);
        SchedulableField heightField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.FAMILY_HEIGHT_PARAM);
        
        if (typeMarkField != null) def.AddField(typeMarkField);
        if (widthField != null) def.AddField(widthField);
        if (heightField != null) def.AddField(heightField);
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un muro del tipo 'Genérico - 200mm' en el 'Nivel 1' desde (0,0) hasta (10,5). [/INST]Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault(l => l.Name == "Nivel 1") as Level;
WallType wallType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).FirstOrDefault(wt => wt.Name == "Genérico - 200mm") as WallType;
XYZ startPoint = new XYZ(0, 0, 0);
XYZ endPoint = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(5, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0);

<s>[INST] Crea una rejilla de 5 ejes horizontales y 5 verticales, espaciados 6 metros. [/INST]double spacing = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(6, UnitTypeId.Meters);
int count = 5;
for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
{
    Line line = Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0, i * spacing, 0), new XYZ((count - 1) * spacing, i * spacing, 0));

}
for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
{
    Line line = Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(i * spacing, 0, 0), new XYZ(i * spacing, (count - 1) * spacing, 0));
    Grid.Create(doc, line);
}</s>

<s>[INST] Añade los campos 'Nivel', 'Marca' y 'Volumen' a la tabla de pilares. [/INST]ViewSchedule schedule = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewSchedule)).Cast<ViewSchedule>().FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name.Contains("Pilares") || s.Name.Contains("Column"));

{
    ScheduleDefinition def = schedule.Definition;
    SchedulableField levelField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.FAMILY_LEVEL_PARAM);
    if (levelField != null) def.AddField(levelField);
    SchedulableField markField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.ALL_MODEL_MARK);
    if (markField != null) def.AddField(markField);
    SchedulableField volumeField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.HOST_VOLUME_COMPUTED);
    if (volumeField != null) def.AddField(volumeField);
}</s>

<s>[INST] Elimina todos los tipos de muro no utilizados en el proyecto. [/INST]ICollection<ElementId> allWallTypes = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).ToElementIds();
ICollection<ElementId> usedWallTypes = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).WhereElementIsNotElementType().Select(w => w.GetTypeId()).Distinct().ToList();
List<ElementId> unusedWallTypes = allWallTypes.Except(usedWallTypes).ToList();
if (unusedWallTypes.Any())
{
    doc.Delete(unusedWallTypes);
}</s>

if (unusedWallTypes.Any())
{
    doc.Delete(unusedWallTypes);
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un muro en Nivel 1 de (0,0,0) a (5,0,0) con 5m de alto. [/INST]Level level1 = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault(l => l.Name == "Nivel 1") as Level;
if (level1 != null)
{
    WallType wallType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).FirstOrDefault() as WallType;
    if(wallType != null)
    {
        Line wallCurve = Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0, 0, 0), new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(5, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0, 0));
        double height = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(5, UnitTypeId.Meters);
        Wall.Create(doc, wallCurve, wallType.Id, level1.Id, height, 0.0, false, false);
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un nuevo tipo de muro 'Muro Genérico 300mm' con un grosor de 30cm. [/INST]string newTypeName = "Muro Genérico 300mm";
WallType oldWallType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).FirstOrDefault() as WallType;
if(oldWallType != null)
{
    WallType newWallType = oldWallType.Duplicate(newTypeName) as WallType;
    if(newWallType != null)
    {
        CompoundStructure cs = newWallType.GetCompoundStructure();
        if(cs != null)
        {
            cs.SetLayerWidth(cs.GetFirstCoreLayerIndex(), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(300, UnitTypeId.Millimeters));
            newWallType.SetCompoundStructure(cs);
        }
    }
}</s>

            newWallType.SetCompoundStructure(cs);
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Cambia el tipo de todos los muros seleccionados a 'Muro Exterior'. [/INST]UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
ICollection<ElementId> selectedIds = uidoc.Selection.GetElementIds();
WallType targetWallType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).Cast<WallType>().FirstOrDefault(wt => wt.Name == "Muro Exterior");
if(targetWallType != null)
{
    foreach(ElementId id in selectedIds)
    {
        Wall wall = doc.GetElement(id) as Wall;
        if(wall != null)
        {
            wall.ChangeTypeId(targetWallType.Id);
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una rejilla de 5 ejes horizontales y 5 verticales, espaciados 6 metros. [/INST]double spacing = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(6, UnitTypeId.Meters);
int count = 5;
for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
{
    Line line = Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0, i * spacing, 0), new XYZ((count - 1) * spacing, i * spacing, 0));
    Grid.Create(doc, line);
}
for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
{
    Line line = Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(i * spacing, 0, 0), new XYZ(i * spacing, (count - 1) * spacing, 0));
    Grid.Create(doc, line);
}</s>

<s>[INST] Create a grid of 5 horizontal and 5 vertical grids, spaced 6 meters apart. [/INST]double spacing = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(6, UnitTypeId.Meters);
int count = 5;
for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
{
    Line line = Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0, i * spacing, 0), new XYZ((count - 1) * spacing, i * spacing, 0));
    Grid.Create(doc, line);
}
for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
{
    Line line = Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(i * spacing, 0, 0), new XYZ(i * spacing, (count - 1) * spacing, 0));
    Grid.Create(doc, line);
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un tipo de muro 'Muro-Doble' de 30cm y luego crea un muro de ese tipo. [/INST]string newTypeName = "Muro-Doble";
WallType newWallType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).FirstOrDefault(wt => wt.Name == newTypeName) as WallType;

{
    WallType wallTypeToDuplicate = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).FirstOrDefault() as WallType;
    if(wallTypeToDuplicate != null)
    {
        newWallType = wallTypeToDuplicate.Duplicate(newTypeName) as WallType;
        if(newWallType!=null)
        {
            CompoundStructure cs = newWallType.GetCompoundStructure();
            if(cs != null)
            {
                cs.SetLayerWidth(cs.GetFirstCoreLayerIndex(), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(0.3, UnitTypeId.Meters));
                newWallType.SetCompoundStructure(cs);
            }
        }
    }
}

Line wallCurve = Line.CreateBound(XYZ.Zero, new XYZ(10,0,0));
Wall.Create(doc, wallCurve, newWallType.Id, level.Id, UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(3, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0, false, false);</s>

<s>[INST] Obtén todos los muros del Nivel 1 que son estructurales. [/INST]Level level1 = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault(l => l.Name == "Nivel 1") as Level;
if (level1 != null)
{
    ElementLevelFilter levelFilter = new ElementLevelFilter(level1.Id);
    ElementCategoryFilter categoryFilter = new ElementCategoryFilter(BuiltInCategory.OST_Walls);
    ParameterValueProvider pvp = new ParameterValueProvider(new ElementId(BuiltInParameter.WALL_STRUCTURAL_SIGNIFICANT));
    FilterIntegerRule rule = new FilterIntegerRule(pvp, new FilterNumericEquals(), 1);
    ElementParameterFilter structuralFilter = new ElementParameterFilter(rule);
    LogicalAndFilter andFilter = new LogicalAndFilter(new List<ElementFilter> { levelFilter, categoryFilter, structuralFilter });
    List<Element> structuralWalls = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).WherePasses(andFilter).ToList();
}</s>

if (level1 != null)
{
    ElementLevelFilter levelFilter = new ElementLevelFilter(level1.Id);
    ElementCategoryFilter categoryFilter = new ElementCategoryFilter(BuiltInCategory.OST_Walls);
    ParameterValueProvider pvp = new ParameterValueProvider(new ElementId(BuiltInParameter.WALL_STRUCTURAL_SIGNIFICANT));
    FilterIntegerRule rule = new FilterIntegerRule(pvp, new FilterNumericEquals(), 1);
    ElementParameterFilter structuralFilter = new ElementParameterFilter(rule);
    LogicalAndFilter andFilter = new LogicalAndFilter(new List<ElementFilter> { levelFilter, categoryFilter, structuralFilter });
    List<Element> structuralWalls = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).WherePasses(andFilter).ToList();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Añade los campos 'Nivel', 'Marca' y 'Volumen' a la tabla de pilares. [/INST]ViewSchedule schedule = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewSchedule)).Cast<ViewSchedule>().FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name.Contains("Pilares") || s.Name.Contains("Column"));
if (schedule != null)
{
    ScheduleDefinition def = schedule.Definition;
    SchedulableField levelField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.FAMILY_LEVEL_PARAM);
    if (levelField != null) def.AddField(levelField);
    SchedulableField markField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.ALL_MODEL_MARK);
    if (markField != null) def.AddField(markField);
    SchedulableField volumeField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.HOST_VOLUME_COMPUTED);
    if (volumeField != null) def.AddField(volumeField);
}</s>

<s>[INST] Add the 'Level', 'Mark', and 'Volume' fields to the column schedule. [/INST]ViewSchedule schedule = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewSchedule)).Cast<ViewSchedule>().FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name.Contains("Column"));
if (schedule != null)
{
    ScheduleDefinition def = schedule.Definition;
    SchedulableField levelField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.FAMILY_LEVEL_PARAM);
    if (levelField != null) def.AddField(levelField);
    SchedulableField markField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.ALL_MODEL_MARK);
    if (markField != null) def.AddField(markField);
    SchedulableField volumeField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.HOST_VOLUME_COMPUTED);
    if (volumeField != null) def.AddField(volumeField);
}</s>

<s>[INST] Oculta todos los elementos de anotación en la vista activa. [/INST]if (doc.ActiveView != null)
{
    List<BuiltInCategory> annotationCategories = new List<BuiltInCategory>
    {
        BuiltInCategory.OST_GenericAnnotation,
        BuiltInCategory.OST_TextNotes,
        BuiltInCategory.OST_Tags,
        BuiltInCategory.OST_Dimensions,
        BuiltInCategory.OST_DetailComponents
    };
    ElementMulticategoryFilter multiCategoryFilter = new ElementMulticategoryFilter(annotationCategories);
    ICollection<ElementId> elementsToHide = new FilteredElementCollector(doc, doc.ActiveView.Id).WherePasses(multiCategoryFilter).ToElementIds();

<s>[INST] Añade una etiqueta a la columna más cercana al origen. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Tag Column"))
{
    t.Start();
    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;
    FamilyInstance column = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralColumns).WhereElementIsNotElementType().Cast<FamilyInstance>().OrderBy(c => {
        LocationPoint lp = c.Location as LocationPoint;
        return lp != null ? lp.Point.DistanceTo(XYZ.Zero) : double.MaxValue;
    }).FirstOrDefault();

    if (activeView != null && column != null)
    {
        LocationPoint loc = column.Location as LocationPoint;
        if (loc != null)
        {
            IndependentTag.Create(doc, activeView.Id, new Reference(column), true, TagMode.TM_ADDBY_CATEGORY, TagOrientation.Horizontal, loc.Point);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Pinta la cara interior de los muros exteriores con 'Pintura Blanca'. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Paint Walls"))
{
    t.Start();
    Material paintMaterial = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Material)).Cast<Material>().FirstOrDefault(m => m.Name == "Pintura Blanca");
    var exteriorWalls = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).Cast<Wall>().Where(w => w.WallType.Function == WallFunction.Exterior).ToList();

    if (paintMaterial != null)
    {
        foreach (Wall w in exteriorWalls)
        {
            IList<Reference> interiorFaceRefs = HostObjectUtils.GetSideFaces(w, ShellLayerType.Interior);
            if(interiorFaceRefs.Count > 0)
            {
                Face interiorFace = w.GetGeometryObjectFromReference(interiorFaceRefs.First()) as Face;
                if (interiorFace != null)
                {
                    doc.Paint(w.Id, interiorFace, paintMaterial.Id);
                }
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Añade un codo de 90 grados entre dos tuberías. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Add Elbow"))
{
    t.Start();
    List<Pipe> pipes = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Pipe)).Cast<Pipe>().Where(p => p.ConnectorManager != null && p.ConnectorManager.UnusedConnectors.Size > 0).Take(2).ToList();

    if (pipes.Count >= 2)
    {
        Connector c1 = pipes[0].ConnectorManager.UnusedConnectors.Cast<Connector>().FirstOrDefault();
        Connector c2 = pipes[1].ConnectorManager.UnusedConnectors.Cast<Connector>().FirstOrDefault();
        
        if (c1 != null && c2 != null)
        {
            doc.Create.NewElbowFitting(c1, c2);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

    if (pipes.Count >= 2)
    {
        Connector c1 = pipes[0].ConnectorManager.UnusedConnectors.Cast<Connector>().FirstOrDefault();

<s>[INST] Crea un filtro de vista para ocultar muros demolidos. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Demolition Filter"))
{
    t.Start();
    Phase demolishedPhase = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Phase)).Cast<Phase>().FirstOrDefault(p => p.Name.Contains("Demolished") || p.Name.Contains("Demolición"));
    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;

    if (demolishedPhase != null && activeView != null)
    {
        ElementId paramId = new ElementId(BuiltInParameter.PHASE_DEMOLISHED);
        FilterRule rule = ParameterFilterRuleFactory.CreateEqualsRule(paramId, demolishedPhase.Id);
        ElementFilter filter = new ElementParameterFilter(rule);
        ICollection<ElementId> categories = new List<ElementId>{ new ElementId(BuiltInCategory.OST_Walls) };
        ParameterFilterElement pfe = ParameterFilterElement.Create(doc, "Filtro Demolición", categories, filter);
        
        if (pfe != null)
        {
            activeView.AddFilter(pfe.Id);
            activeView.SetFilterVisibility(pfe.Id, false);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Encuentra todas las colisiones entre tuberías y vigas. [/INST]ICollection<ElementId> pipeIds = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_PipeCurves).WhereElementIsNotElementType().ToElementIds();
ICollection<ElementId> beamIds = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralFraming).WhereElementIsNotElementType().ToElementIds();

if(pipeIds.Count > 0 && beamIds.Count > 0)
{
    List<ElementFilter> beamFilters = new List<ElementFilter>();
    foreach(ElementId beamId in beamIds)
    {
        Element beam = doc.GetElement(beamId);
        if(beam != null) beamFilters.Add(new ElementIntersectsElementFilter(beam));
    }
    LogicalOrFilter clashFilter = new LogicalOrFilter(beamFilters);
    ICollection<ElementId> clashingPipeIds = new FilteredElementCollector(doc, pipeIds).WherePasses(clashFilter).ToElementIds();
    // clashingPipeIds contiene los IDs de los elementos en colisión, la selección/visualización es externa.
}</s>

<s>[INST] Cambia un panel de vidrio de un muro cortina por un panel sólido. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Change Curtain Panel"))
{
    t.Start();
    Wall curtainWall = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).Cast<Wall>().FirstOrDefault(w => w.WallType.Kind == WallKind.Curtain);
    FamilySymbol solidPanelType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(FamilySymbol)).Cast<FamilySymbol>().FirstOrDefault(fs => fs.Family.FamilyCategory.Id.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInCategory.OST_CurtainWallPanels && (fs.Name.Contains("Solid") || fs.Name.Contains("Sólido")));

    if (curtainWall != null && solidPanelType != null)
    {
        CurtainGrid grid = curtainWall.CurtainGrid;
        if (grid != null)
        {
            ElementId panelIdToChange = grid.GetPanelIds().FirstOrDefault();
            if (panelIdToChange != ElementId.InvalidElementId)
            {
                Panel panelToChange = doc.GetElement(panelIdToChange) as Panel;
                if (panelToChange != null) panelToChange.ChangeTypeId(solidPanelType.Id);
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Agrupa una tabla de planificación de habitaciones por Nivel. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Group Schedule"))

    if (schedule != null)
    {
        ScheduleDefinition def = schedule.Definition;
        if (def != null)
        {
            SchedulableField schedulableField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.ROOM_LEVEL_ID);
            if (schedulableField != null)
            {
                ScheduleField field = def.AddField(schedulableField);
                ScheduleSortGroupField sortGroupField = new ScheduleSortGroupField(field.FieldId);
                sortGroupField.ShowHeader = true;
                def.AddSortGroupField(sortGroupField);
                def.IsItemized = false;
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Copia todos los muros del Nivel 1 al Nivel 2. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Copy Walls"))
{
    t.Start();
    Level level1 = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).Cast<Level>().FirstOrDefault(l => l.Name == "Nivel 1");
    Level level2 = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).Cast<Level>().FirstOrDefault(l => l.Name == "Nivel 2");

    if (level1 != null && level2 != null)
    {
        ICollection<ElementId> wallsToCopy = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).Where(e => (e as Wall) != null && (e as Wall).LevelId.Equals(level1.Id)).Select(e => e.Id).ToList();
        double elevationDiff = level2.ProjectElevation - level1.ProjectElevation;
        XYZ translation = new XYZ(0, 0, elevationDiff);
        if (wallsToCopy.Count > 0)
        {
            ElementTransformUtils.CopyElements(doc, wallsToCopy, translation);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Dado un muro, obtén los materiales y sus volúmenes. [/INST]UIDocument localUidoc = uidoc;
Reference pickedRef = localUidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un muro");

Dictionary<string, double> materialVolumes = new Dictionary<string, double>();
if (pickedRef != null)
{
    Wall wall = doc.GetElement(pickedRef) as Wall;
    if (wall != null)
    {
        Parameter areaParam = wall.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.HOST_AREA_COMPUTED);
        if (areaParam != null && areaParam.HasValue)
        {
            double wallArea = areaParam.AsDouble();
            WallType wallType = wall.WallType;
            if (wallType != null)
            {
                CompoundStructure cs = wallType.GetCompoundStructure();
                if (cs != null)
                {
                    foreach(CompoundStructureLayer layer in cs.GetLayers())
                    {
                        Material material = doc.GetElement(layer.MaterialId) as Material;
                        if(material != null)
                        {
                            double volume = layer.Width * wallArea; 
                            materialVolumes[material.Name] = volume;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Given a wall, get its materials and their volumes. [/INST]UIDocument localUidoc = uidoc;
Reference pickedRef = localUidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Select a wall");

Dictionary<string, double> materialVolumes = new Dictionary<string, double>();
if (pickedRef != null)
{
    Wall wall = doc.GetElement(pickedRef) as Wall;
    if (wall != null)
    {
        Parameter areaParam = wall.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.HOST_AREA_COMPUTED);
        if (areaParam != null && areaParam.HasValue)
        {
            double wallArea = areaParam.AsDouble();
            WallType wallType = wall.WallType;
            if (wallType != null)
            {
                CompoundStructure cs = wallType.GetCompoundStructure();
                if (cs != null)
                {
                    foreach(CompoundStructureLayer layer in cs.GetLayers())
                    {
                        Material material = doc.GetElement(layer.MaterialId) as Material;
                        if(material != null)
                        {
                            double volume = layer.Width * wallArea;
                            materialVolumes[material.Name] = volume;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una nueva hoja A1 y coloca la vista 'Planta Baja' en ella. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Sheet"))
{
    t.Start();
    string sheetNumber = "A-101";
    FamilySymbol titleBlock = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_TitleBlocks).WhereElementIsElementType().Cast<FamilySymbol>().FirstOrDefault(tb => tb.Name.Contains("A1"));
    View viewToPlace = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewPlan)).Cast<View>().FirstOrDefault(v => v.Name == "Planta Baja");

    if (titleBlock != null && viewToPlace != null)
    {
        ViewSheet newSheet = ViewSheet.Create(doc, titleBlock.Id);
        if (newSheet != null)
        {
            newSheet.Name = "Planta Arquitectónica - Planta Baja";
            newSheet.SheetNumber = sheetNumber;
            BoundingBoxUV sheetBox = newSheet.Outline;
            UV centerUv = (sheetBox.Min + sheetBox.Max) / 2;
            XYZ centerPoint = new XYZ(centerUv.U, centerUv.V, 0);
            Viewport.Create(doc, newSheet.Id, viewToPlace.Id, centerPoint);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Oculta todas las categorías de anotación en la vista activa. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Hide Annotation Categories"))
{

    Categories categories = doc.Settings.Categories;
    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;

    if (activeView != null)
    {
        foreach(Category cat in categories)
        {
            if(cat.CategoryType == CategoryType.Annotation && cat.get_AllowsVisibilityControl(activeView))

<s>[INST] Etiqueta todas las habitaciones con su área. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Tag All Rooms"))
{
    t.Start();
    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;

    if (activeView != null)
    {
        List<Room> rooms = new FilteredElementCollector(doc, activeView.Id).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Rooms).WhereElementIsNotElementType().Cast<Room>().ToList();
        foreach(Room room in rooms)
        {
            LocationPoint loc = room.Location as LocationPoint;
            if(loc != null)
            {
                doc.Create.NewRoomTag(new LinkElementId(room.Id), new UV(loc.Point.X, loc.Point.Y), activeView.Id);
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Oculta todas las categorías de anotación en la vista activa. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Hide Annotation Categories"))

<s>[INST] Asigna el material 'Acero' a la primera capa de un tipo de muro. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Assign Material"))
{
    t.Start();
    WallType wallType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).Cast<WallType>().FirstOrDefault(wt => wt.GetCompoundStructure() != null);
    Material steel = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Material)).Cast<Material>().FirstOrDefault(m => m.Name.Contains("Steel") || m.Name.Contains("Acero"));

    if (wallType != null && steel != null)
    {
        CompoundStructure cs = wallType.GetCompoundStructure();
        if (cs != null && cs.LayerCount > 0)
        {
            cs.SetMaterialId(0, steel.Id);
            wallType.SetCompoundStructure(cs);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un pilar del tipo 'Hormigón-Rectangular 30x60' en cada intersección de la rejilla. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Columns at Grids"))
{
    t.Start();
    FamilySymbol columnSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralColumns).WhereElementIsElementType().Cast<FamilySymbol>().FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name == "Hormigón-Rectangular 30x60");
    Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).Cast<Level>().OrderBy(l => l.Elevation).FirstOrDefault();
    List<Grid> grids = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Grid)).Cast<Grid>().ToList();
    if (columnSymbol != null && level != null)
    {
        if (!columnSymbol.IsActive) columnSymbol.Activate();
        for (int i = 0; i < grids.Count; i++)
        {
            for (int j = i + 1; j < grids.Count; j++)
            {
                IntersectionResultArray results;
                if(grids[i].Curve.Intersect(grids[j].Curve, out results) == SetComparisonResult.Overlap)
                {
                    if (results != null && !results.IsEmpty)
                    {
                        foreach (IntersectionResult ir in results)
                        {
                            doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(ir.XYZPoint, columnSymbol, level, StructuralType.Column);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una nueva hoja A3 y colócale una leyenda. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Sheet with Legend"))
{
    t.Start();
    FamilySymbol titleBlock = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_TitleBlocks).WhereElementIsElementType().Cast<FamilySymbol>().FirstOrDefault(tb => tb.Name.Contains("A3"));
    View legendView = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(View)).Cast<View>().FirstOrDefault(v => v.ViewType == ViewType.Legend);

    if (titleBlock != null && legendView != null)
    {
        ViewSheet newSheet = ViewSheet.Create(doc, titleBlock.Id);
        if (newSheet != null)
        {
            BoundingBoxUV sheetBox = newSheet.Outline;
            UV centerUv = (sheetBox.Min + sheetBox.Max) / 2.0;
            XYZ centerPoint = new XYZ(centerUv.U, centerUv.V, 0);
            Viewport.Create(doc, newSheet.Id, legendView.Id, centerPoint);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un techo por extrusión con un perfil en arco. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Extrusion Roof"))
{
    t.Start();
    Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
    RoofType roofType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(RoofType)).FirstOrDefault() as RoofType;

    if (level != null && roofType != null && doc.ActiveView != null)
    {
        CurveArray profile = new CurveArray();
        profile.Append(Arc.Create(new XYZ(-10,0,0), new XYZ(10,0,0), new XYZ(0,5,0)));
        Plane plane = Plane.CreateByNormalAndOrigin(XYZ.BasisY, XYZ.Zero);
        ReferencePlane refPlane = doc.Create.NewReferencePlane(plane.Origin, plane.Origin + XYZ.BasisX, plane.Normal, doc.ActiveView);
        if(refPlane != null)
            doc.Create.NewExtrusionRoof(profile, refPlane, level, roofType, 0, 20);
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

    Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).Cast<Level>().OrderBy(l => l.Elevation).FirstOrDefault();
    List<Grid> grids = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Grid)).Cast<Grid>().ToList();
    if (columnSymbol != null && level != null)
    {
        if (!columnSymbol.IsActive) columnSymbol.Activate();
        for (int i = 0; i < grids.Count; i++)
        {
            for (int j = i + 1; j < grids.Count; j++)
            {
                IntersectionResultArray results;
                if(grids[i].Curve.Intersect(grids[j].Curve, out results) == SetComparisonResult.Overlap)
                {
                    if (results != null && !results.IsEmpty)
                    {
                        foreach (IntersectionResult ir in results)
                        {
                            doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(ir.XYZPoint, columnSymbol, level, StructuralType.Column);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Pinta la cara interior de los muros exteriores con 'Pintura Blanca'. [/INST]using(Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Paint Walls"))
{
    t.Start();
    Material paintMaterial = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Material)).Cast<Material>().FirstOrDefault(m => m.Name == "Pintura Blanca");
    var exteriorWalls = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).Cast<Wall>().Where(w => w.WallType.Function == WallFunction.Exterior).ToList();
    if(paintMaterial != null)
    {
        foreach (Wall w in exteriorWalls)
        {
            IList<Reference> interiorFaceRefs = HostObjectUtils.GetSideFaces(w, ShellLayerType.Interior);
            if(interiorFaceRefs.Count > 0)
            {
                Face interiorFace = w.GetGeometryObjectFromReference(interiorFaceRefs.First()) as Face;
                if (interiorFace != null)
                {
                    doc.Paint(w.Id, interiorFace, paintMaterial.Id);
                }
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un techo por contorno en el 'Nivel de Cubierta'. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Roof"))
{
    t.Start();
    Level roofLevel = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).Cast<Level>().FirstOrDefault(l => l.Name == "Nivel de Cubierta");
    RoofType roofType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(RoofType)).FirstOrDefault() as RoofType;
    if(roofLevel != null && roofType != null)
    {
        CurveArray roofProfile = new CurveArray();
        roofProfile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0,0,0), new XYZ(20,0,0)));
        roofProfile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(20,0,0), new XYZ(20,30,0)));
        roofProfile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(20,30,0), new XYZ(0,30,0)));
        roofProfile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0,30,0), new XYZ(0,0,0)));
        ModelCurveArray mapping = new ModelCurveArray();
        doc.Create.NewFootPrintRoof(roofProfile, roofLevel, roofType, out mapping);
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Dibuja una región rellena con patrón diagonal. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Draw Filled Region"))
{
    t.Start();
    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;
    FillPatternElement fillPattern = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(FillPatternElement)).Cast<FillPatternElement>().FirstOrDefault(p => !p.GetFillPattern().IsSolidFill);
    if (activeView != null && fillPattern != null)
    {
        FilledRegionType filledRegionType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc, activeView.Id).OfClass(typeof(FilledRegionType)).FirstOrDefault() as FilledRegionType;
        if (filledRegionType != null)
        {
            FilledRegionType newType = filledRegionType.Duplicate("Temp Diagonal Region") as FilledRegionType;
            if (newType != null)
            {
                newType.ForegroundPatternId = fillPattern.Id;
                CurveLoop profile = new CurveLoop();
                profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0, 0, 0), new XYZ(5, 0, 0)));
                profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(5, 0, 0), new XYZ(5, 5, 0)));
                profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(5, 5, 0), new XYZ(0, 5, 0)));
                profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0, 5, 0), new XYZ(0, 0, 0)));
                FilledRegion.Create(doc, newType.Id, activeView.Id, new List<CurveLoop> { profile });
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Establece el parámetro 'Comentarios' de todas las puertas del Nivel 1 a 'Clasificación Fuego - 90 min'. [/INST]using(Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Set Door Comments"))
{
    t.Start();
    Level level1 = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).Cast<Level>().FirstOrDefault(l => l.Name == "Nivel 1");
    if(level1 != null)
    {
        List<FamilyInstance> doorsOnLevel1 = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Doors).WhereElementIsNotElementType().Cast<FamilyInstance>().Where(fi => fi.LevelId.Equals(level1.Id)).ToList();
        foreach(FamilyInstance door in doorsOnLevel1)
        {
            Parameter commentsParam = door.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.ALL_MODEL_INSTANCE_COMMENTS);
            if(commentsParam != null && !commentsParam.IsReadOnly)
            {
                commentsParam.Set("Clasificación Fuego - 90 min");
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Obtén la geometría sólida de un elemento seleccionado. [/INST]UIDocument localUidoc = uidoc;
Reference pickedRef = localUidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un elemento para obtener su geometría");
if(pickedRef != null)
{
    Element elem = doc.GetElement(pickedRef);
    if(elem != null)
    {
        Options opt = new Options() { ComputeReferences = true, DetailLevel = ViewDetailLevel.Fine };
        GeometryElement geoElem = elem.get_Geometry(opt);
        if(geoElem != null)
        {
            List<Solid> solids = geoElem.OfType<Solid>().Where(s => s.Volume > 0).ToList();
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Acota la longitud de un muro seleccionado por el usuario. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Dimension Wall"))
{
    t.Start();
    UIDocument localUidoc = uidoc;
    Reference wallRef = localUidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un muro para acotar");
    if(wallRef != null)
    {
        Wall wall = doc.GetElement(wallRef) as Wall;
        if(wall != null)
        {
            LocationCurve locCurve = wall.Location as LocationCurve;
            Curve wallCurve = locCurve != null ? locCurve.Curve : null;
            if(wallCurve != null && wallCurve is Line)
            {
                Line wallLine = wallCurve as Line;
                ReferenceArray refs = new ReferenceArray();
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(0));
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(1));
                XYZ pt1 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(0).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                XYZ pt2 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(1).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                Line dimLine = Line.CreateBound(pt1, pt2);
                doc.Create.NewDimension(doc.ActiveView, dimLine, refs);
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Inserta una armadura (truss) de 6 metros entre dos puntos. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Truss"))
{
    t.Start();
    Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
    FamilySymbol trussSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralFraming).WhereElementIsElementType().Cast<FamilySymbol>().FirstOrDefault(fs => fs.Family.Name.Contains("Truss"));

    if (level != null && trussSymbol != null)
    {
        if (!trussSymbol.IsActive) { trussSymbol.Activate(); }
        Line trussLine = Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0, 10, 0), new XYZ(6 / 0.3048, 10, 0));
        doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(trussLine, trussSymbol, level, StructuralType.NonStructural);
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un conducto eléctrico de 1 pulgada de diámetro. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Conduit"))
{
    t.Start();
    Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
    ElementId conduitTypeId = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ConduitType)).FirstElementId();

    if (level != null && conduitTypeId != null && conduitTypeId != ElementId.InvalidElementId)
    {
        XYZ start = new XYZ(0, 0, 3 / 0.3048);

<s>[INST] Dibuja un conducto de ventilación rectangular de 300x200 milímetros. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Duct"))

    MEPSystemType systemType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(MEPSystemType)).Cast<MEPSystemType>().FirstOrDefault(s => s.SystemClassification == MEPSystemClassification.SupplyAir);

    if (level != null && ductType != null && systemType != null)

        XYZ p2 = new XYZ(10 / 0.3048, 0, 3 / 0.3048);

        if (duct != null)

            Parameter widthParam = duct.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.RBS_CURVE_WIDTH_PARAM);
            Parameter heightParam = duct.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.RBS_CURVE_HEIGHT_PARAM);

            if (heightParam != null && !heightParam.IsReadOnly) heightParam.Set(200 / 304.8);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Create a new 25cm wall type named 'Structural Wall 25cm'. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Wall Type"))
{
    t.Start();
    string newTypeName = "Structural Wall 25cm";
    WallType wallTypeToDuplicate = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).FirstOrDefault() as WallType;

    if (wallTypeToDuplicate != null)
    {
        WallType newWallType = wallTypeToDuplicate.Duplicate(newTypeName) as WallType;
        if (newWallType != null)
        {
            CompoundStructure cs = newWallType.GetCompoundStructure();
            int coreLayerIndex = cs.GetFirstCoreLayerIndex();
            cs.SetLayerFunction(coreLayerIndex, MaterialFunctionAssignment.Structure);
            cs.SetLayerWidth(coreLayerIndex, 0.25 / 0.3048);
            newWallType.SetCompoundStructure(cs);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un techo por contorno en el 'Nivel de Cubierta'. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Roof"))
{
    t.Start();
    Level roofLevel = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).Cast<Level>().FirstOrDefault(l => l.Name == "Nivel de Cubierta");
    RoofType roofType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(RoofType)).FirstOrDefault() as RoofType;

    if (roofLevel != null && roofType != null)
    {
        CurveArray roofProfile = new CurveArray();
        roofProfile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0,0,0), new XYZ(20 / 0.3048,0,0)));
        roofProfile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(20 / 0.3048,0,0), new XYZ(20 / 0.3048,30 / 0.3048,0)));
        roofProfile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(20 / 0.3048,30 / 0.3048,0), new XYZ(0,30 / 0.3048,0)));
        roofProfile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0,30 / 0.3048,0), new XYZ(0,0,0)));
        ModelCurveArray mapping = new ModelCurveArray();
        doc.Create.NewFootPrintRoof(roofProfile, roofLevel, roofType, out mapping);
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Rota el norte del proyecto 30 grados en sentido horario. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Rotate Project North"))
{
    t.Start();
    BasePoint projectBasePoint = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(BasePoint)).Cast<BasePoint>().FirstOrDefault(bp => !bp.IsShared);

    if (projectBasePoint != null)
    {
        double angleInDegrees = 30.0;
        double angleInRadians = -(angleInDegrees * Math.PI / 180.0);
        using (var bbox = projectBasePoint.get_BoundingBox(null))
        {
          if (bbox != null)
          {
            XYZ center = bbox.Min;
            Line axis = Line.CreateBound(center, center + XYZ.BasisZ);
            ElementTransformUtils.RotateElement(doc, projectBasePoint.Id, axis, angleInRadians);
          }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Añade una línea de rejilla horizontal a un muro cortina a 1.5 metros de altura. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Add Curtain Grid Line"))
{
    t.Start();
    Wall cw = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).Cast<Wall>().FirstOrDefault(w => w.CurtainGrid != null);

    if (cw != null)
    {
        CurtainGrid cg = cw.CurtainGrid;
        if (cg != null)
        {
            LocationCurve locCurve = cw.Location as LocationCurve;
            if(locCurve != null)
            {
                 XYZ startPoint = locCurve.Curve.GetEndPoint(0);
                 XYZ endPoint = locCurve.Curve.GetEndPoint(1);
                 XYZ midPoint = (startPoint + endPoint) / 2;
                 XYZ gridLinePoint = new XYZ(midPoint.X, midPoint.Y, 1.5 / 0.3048);
                 cg.AddGridLine(false, gridLinePoint, false);
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Ajusta la región de recorte de la vista a un rectángulo de (0,0) a (20,20). [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Adjust Crop Region"))

    if (view != null && view.CropBoxActive)
    {
        BoundingBoxXYZ cropBox = view.CropBox;
        if (cropBox != null)
        {
            XYZ minPoint = new XYZ(0, 0, cropBox.Min.Z);
            XYZ maxPoint = new XYZ(20 / 0.3048, 20 / 0.3048, cropBox.Max.Z);
            cropBox.Min = minPoint;
            cropBox.Max = maxPoint;
            view.CropBox = cropBox;
            view.CropBoxVisible = true;
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Create a view filter to hide demolished walls. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Demolition Filter"))
{
    t.Start();
    Phase demolishedPhase = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Phase)).Cast<Phase>().FirstOrDefault(p => p.Name.Contains("Demolished") || p.Name.Contains("Demolición"));
    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;

    if (demolishedPhase != null && activeView != null)
    {
        ElementId paramId = new ElementId(BuiltInParameter.PHASE_DEMOLISHED);
        FilterRule rule = ParameterFilterRuleFactory.CreateEqualsRule(paramId, demolishedPhase.Id);
        ElementFilter filter = new ElementParameterFilter(rule);
        ICollection<ElementId> categories = new List<ElementId>{ new ElementId(BuiltInCategory.OST_Walls) };
        ParameterFilterElement pfe = ParameterFilterElement.Create(doc, "Demolition Filter", categories, filter);
        
        if (pfe != null)
        {
            activeView.AddFilter(pfe.Id);
            activeView.SetFilterVisibility(pfe.Id, false);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Dibuja una región rellena con patrón diagonal. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Draw Filled Region"))
{
    t.Start();
    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;
    FillPatternElement fillPattern = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(FillPatternElement)).Cast<FillPatternElement>().FirstOrDefault(p => !p.GetFillPattern().IsSolidFill);

    if (activeView != null && fillPattern != null)
    {
        FilledRegionType filledRegionType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc, activeView.Id).OfClass(typeof(FilledRegionType)).FirstOrDefault() as FilledRegionType;
        if (filledRegionType != null)
        {
            FilledRegionType newType = filledRegionType.Duplicate("Temp Diagonal Region") as FilledRegionType;
            if (newType != null)
            {
                newType.ForegroundPatternId = fillPattern.Id;
                XYZ p1 = new XYZ(0,0,0);
                XYZ p2 = new XYZ(5 / 0.3048,0,0);
                XYZ p3 = new XYZ(5 / 0.3048,5 / 0.3048,0);
                XYZ p4 = new XYZ(0,5 / 0.3048,0);
                CurveLoop profile = new CurveLoop();
                profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p1,p2));
                profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p2,p3));
                profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p3,p4));
                profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p4,p1));
                FilledRegion.Create(doc, newType.Id, activeView.Id, new List<CurveLoop>{profile});
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un techo por extrusión con una pendiente del 10%. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Extrusion Roof"))

    RoofType roofType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(RoofType)).FirstOrDefault() as RoofType;

    if (level != null && roofType != null)

        profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0,0,0), new XYZ(10 / 0.3048, 0, 1 / 0.3048)));

        if (refPlane != null)

        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un circuito eléctrico conectando luminarias a un panel. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Electrical Circuit"))
{
    t.Start();
    FamilyInstance panel = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_ElectricalEquipment).WhereElementIsNotElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilyInstance;
    List<ElementId> fixtureIds = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_LightingFixtures).WhereElementIsNotElementType().ToElementIds().ToList();

    if (panel != null && fixtureIds.Count > 0)
    {
        ElectricalSystem electricalSystem = ElectricalSystem.Create(doc, fixtureIds, ElectricalSystemType.PowerCircuit);
        if(electricalSystem != null)
        {
            electricalSystem.SelectPanel(panel);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una región rellena con un patrón de 'Concreto'. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Filled Region"))

    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;

    if (regionType != null && activeView != null)
    {
        XYZ p1 = new XYZ(0,0,0);
        XYZ p2 = new XYZ(5 / 0.3048, 0,0);
        XYZ p3 = new XYZ(5 / 0.3048, 5 / 0.3048,0);
        XYZ p4 = new XYZ(0, 5 / 0.3048,0);
        CurveLoop profile = new CurveLoop();
        profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p1,p2));
        profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p2,p3));
        profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p3,p4));
        profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p4,p1));
        FilledRegion.Create(doc, regionType.Id, activeView.Id, new List<CurveLoop>{profile});
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Coloca una cota de elevación en una cara y un punto de vista dados. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Place Spot Elevation"))
