<s>[INST] Crea un nuevo tipo de cota lineal con texto azul y tamaño 2mm. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Dimension Type"))
{
    t.Start();
    string newTypeName = "Cota Azul 2mm";
    DimensionType linearDimType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(DimensionType)).Cast<DimensionType>().FirstOrDefault(dt => dt.StyleType == DimensionStyleType.Linear);

    if (linearDimType != null)
    {
        DimensionType newDimType = linearDimType.Duplicate(newTypeName) as DimensionType;
        if (newDimType != null)
        {
            Parameter colorParam = newDimType.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.LINE_COLOR);
            if (colorParam != null && !colorParam.IsReadOnly) colorParam.Set(255);
            Parameter textSizeParam = newDimType.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.TEXT_SIZE);
            if (textSizeParam != null && !textSizeParam.IsReadOnly) textSizeParam.Set(2 / 304.8);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un suelo con un hueco circular en el centro. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Floor with Hole"))
{
    t.Start();
    Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
    FloorType floorType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(FloorType)).FirstOrDefault() as FloorType;

    if (level != null && floorType != null)
    {
        XYZ p1 = new XYZ(-10 / 0.3048, -10 / 0.3048, 0);
        XYZ p2 = new XYZ(10 / 0.3048, -10 / 0.3048, 0);
        XYZ p3 = new XYZ(10 / 0.3048, 10 / 0.3048, 0);
        XYZ p4 = new XYZ(-10 / 0.3048, 10 / 0.3048, 0);
        CurveLoop outerLoop = new CurveLoop();
        outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p1, p2));
        outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p2, p3));
        outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p3, p4));
        outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p4, p1));

        XYZ center = XYZ.Zero;
        double radius = 2 / 0.3048;
        CurveLoop innerLoop = new CurveLoop();
        innerLoop.Append(Arc.Create(center - XYZ.BasisX * radius, center + XYZ.BasisX * radius, center + XYZ.BasisY * radius));
        innerLoop.Append(Arc.Create(center + XYZ.BasisX * radius, center - XYZ.BasisX * radius, center - XYZ.BasisY * radius));

        Floor.Create(doc, new List<CurveLoop> { outerLoop, innerLoop }, floorType.Id, level.Id);
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un techo por extrusión con una pendiente del 10%. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Extrusion Roof"))

    if (level != null && roofType != null)

            doc.Create.NewExtrusionRoof(profile, refPlane, level, roofType, 0, 10 / 0.3048);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una nota de texto con una flecha apuntando a un elemento y una ubicación dadas. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Text Note"))
{
    t.Start();
    UIDocument localUidoc = uidoc;
    Reference target = localUidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un elemento para anotar");
    XYZ textLocation = localUidoc.Selection.PickPoint("Elige la ubicación del texto");

    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;
    ElementId defaultTypeId = doc.GetDefaultElementTypeId(ElementTypeGroup.TextNoteType);

    if (target != null && textLocation != null && activeView != null && defaultTypeId != ElementId.InvalidElementId)
    {
        TextNoteOptions opts = new TextNoteOptions(defaultTypeId);
        opts.HorizontalAlignment = HorizontalTextAlignment.Left;
        TextNote note = TextNote.Create(doc, activeView.Id, textLocation, "Revisar este elemento", opts);
        if (note != null)
        {
            Leader leader = note.AddLeader(TextNoteLeaderTypes.TNLT_STRAIGHT_L);
            leader.End = target.GlobalPoint;
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un nuevo tipo de cota lineal con texto azul y tamaño 2mm. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Dimension Type"))
{
    t.Start();
    string newTypeName = "Cota Azul 2mm";
    DimensionType linearDimType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(DimensionType)).Cast<DimensionType>().FirstOrDefault(dt => dt.StyleType == DimensionStyleType.Linear);

    if (linearDimType != null)
    {
        DimensionType newDimType = linearDimType.Duplicate(newTypeName) as DimensionType;
        if (newDimType != null)
        {
            Parameter colorParam = newDimType.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.LINE_COLOR);
            if (colorParam != null && !colorParam.IsReadOnly) colorParam.Set(255);
            Parameter textSizeParam = newDimType.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.TEXT_SIZE);
            if (textSizeParam != null && !textSizeParam.IsReadOnly) textSizeParam.Set(2 / 304.8);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Encuentra todas las puertas del Nivel 2 que sean de la familia 'Puerta Sencilla'. [/INST]Level level2 = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).Cast<Level>().FirstOrDefault(l => l.Name == "Nivel 2");
List<Element> doors = new List<Element>();

if (level2 != null)
{
    ElementCategoryFilter catFilter = new ElementCategoryFilter(BuiltInCategory.OST_Doors);
    ElementLevelFilter levelFilter = new ElementLevelFilter(level2.Id);
    FilterableValueProvider provider = new ParameterValueProvider(new ElementId(BuiltInParameter.ELEM_FAMILY_PARAM));
    FilterStringRuleEvaluator evaluator = new FilterStringEquals();
    FilterRule famNameRule = new FilterStringRule(provider, evaluator, "Puerta Sencilla");
    ElementParameterFilter famFilter = new ElementParameterFilter(famNameRule);
    LogicalAndFilter andFilter = new LogicalAndFilter(new List<ElementFilter> { catFilter, levelFilter, famFilter });
    doors = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).WherePasses(andFilter).ToList();
}</s>

    FilterableValueProvider provider = new ParameterValueProvider(new ElementId(BuiltInParameter.ELEM_FAMILY_PARAM));
    FilterStringRuleEvaluator evaluator = new FilterStringEquals();
    FilterRule famNameRule = new FilterStringRule(provider, evaluator, "Single-Flush");
    ElementParameterFilter famFilter = new ElementParameterFilter(famNameRule);
    LogicalAndFilter andFilter = new LogicalAndFilter(new List<ElementFilter> { catFilter, levelFilter, famFilter });
    doors = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).WherePasses(andFilter).ToList();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un DirectShape esférico con un radio de 5 metros. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Sphere DirectShape"))
{
    t.Start();
    double radius = 5 / 0.3048;
    List<GeometryObject> solids = new List<GeometryObject>();
    Frame frame = new Frame(XYZ.Zero, XYZ.BasisX, XYZ.BasisY, XYZ.BasisZ);
    Arc arc = Arc.Create(frame.Origin, radius, 0, Math.PI, frame.BasisX, frame.BasisY);
    Line line = Line.CreateBound(arc.GetEndPoint(1), arc.GetEndPoint(0));
    CurveLoop profile = CurveLoop.Create(new List<Curve> { arc, line });
    Solid sphere = GeometryCreationUtilities.CreateRevolvedGeometry(frame, new List<CurveLoop> { profile }, 0, 2 * Math.PI);
    solids.Add(sphere);
    DirectShape ds = DirectShape.CreateElement(doc, new ElementId(BuiltInCategory.OST_GenericModel));

    if (ds != null)
    {
        ds.SetShape(solids);
        ds.Name = "Esfera DirectShape";
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un nuevo tipo de muro 'Muro Genérico 300mm' con un grosor de 30cm. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Wall Type"))
{
    t.Start();
    string newTypeName = "Muro Genérico 300mm";
    WallType oldWallType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).FirstOrDefault() as WallType;

    if (oldWallType != null)
    {
        WallType newWallType = oldWallType.Duplicate(newTypeName) as WallType;
        if (newWallType != null)
        {
            CompoundStructure cs = newWallType.GetCompoundStructure();
            if (cs != null && cs.LayerCount > 0)
            {
                int coreLayerIndex = cs.GetFirstCoreLayerIndex();
                if (coreLayerIndex >= 0 && coreLayerIndex < cs.LayerCount)
                {
                    cs.SetLayerWidth(coreLayerIndex, 300 / 304.8);
                    newWallType.SetCompoundStructure(cs);
                }
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

    WallType newWallType = null;

    {
        newWallType = wallTypeToDuplicate.Duplicate(newTypeName) as WallType;
        if (newWallType != null)
        {
            CompoundStructure cs = newWallType.GetCompoundStructure();
            if (cs != null && cs.LayerCount > 0)
            {
                cs.SetLayerWidth(cs.GetFirstCoreLayerIndex(), 0.3 / 0.3048);
                newWallType.SetCompoundStructure(cs);

    if (newWallType != null)
    {
        Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;

        double height = 3 / 0.3048;
        if (level != null)
        {
            Wall.Create(doc, wallCurve, newWallType.Id, level.Id, height, 0, false, false);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

    Line line = Line.CreateBound(arc.GetEndPoint(1), arc.GetEndPoint(0));
    CurveLoop profile = CurveLoop.Create(new List<Curve> { arc, line });
    Solid sphere = GeometryCreationUtilities.CreateRevolvedGeometry(frame, new List<CurveLoop> { profile }, 0, 2 * Math.PI);
    solids.Add(sphere);
    DirectShape ds = DirectShape.CreateElement(doc, new ElementId(BuiltInCategory.OST_GenericModel));

    if (ds != null)
    {
        ds.SetShape(solids);
        ds.Name = "Esfera DirectShape";
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un nuevo tipo de muro 'Muro Genérico 300mm' con un grosor de 30cm. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Wall Type"))
{
    t.Start();
    string newTypeName = "Muro Genérico 300mm";
    WallType oldWallType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).FirstOrDefault() as WallType;

    if (oldWallType != null)
    {
        WallType newWallType = oldWallType.Duplicate(newTypeName) as WallType;
        if (newWallType != null)
        {
            CompoundStructure cs = newWallType.GetCompoundStructure();
            if (cs != null && cs.LayerCount > 0)
            {
                int coreLayerIndex = cs.GetFirstCoreLayerIndex();
                if (coreLayerIndex >= 0 && coreLayerIndex < cs.LayerCount)
                {
                    cs.SetLayerWidth(coreLayerIndex, 300 / 304.8);
                    newWallType.SetCompoundStructure(cs);
                }
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Ajusta todas las ventanas para que la altura del antepecho sea 1 metro. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Set Sill Height"))

        }
    }

}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una nota de texto con un texto, una ubicación y un elemento de destino dados. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Text Note"))
{
    t.Start();
    UIDocument localUidoc = uidoc;
    Reference targetRef = localUidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona el elemento a anotar");
    XYZ textLocation = localUidoc.Selection.PickPoint("Elige la ubicación del texto");

    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;
    ElementId defaultTypeId = doc.GetDefaultElementTypeId(ElementTypeGroup.TextNoteType);

    if (targetRef != null && textLocation != null && activeView != null && defaultTypeId != ElementId.InvalidElementId)
    {
        TextNoteOptions opts = new TextNoteOptions(defaultTypeId);
        TextNote note = TextNote.Create(doc, activeView.Id, textLocation, "REVISAR CLASH", opts);
        if (note != null)
        {
            Leader leader = note.AddLeader(TextNoteLeaderTypes.TNLT_STRAIGHT_L);
            leader.End = targetRef.GlobalPoint;
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Encuentra todas las puertas del Nivel 2 que sean de la familia 'Puerta Sencilla'. [/INST]Level level2 = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).Cast<Level>().FirstOrDefault(l => l.Name == "Nivel 2");
List<Element> doors = new List<Element>();

if (level2 != null)
{
    ElementCategoryFilter catFilter = new ElementCategoryFilter(BuiltInCategory.OST_Doors);
    ElementLevelFilter levelFilter = new ElementLevelFilter(level2.Id);
    FilterableValueProvider provider = new ParameterValueProvider(new ElementId(BuiltInParameter.ELEM_FAMILY_PARAM));
    FilterStringRuleEvaluator evaluator = new FilterStringEquals();
    FilterRule famNameRule = new FilterStringRule(provider, evaluator, "Puerta Sencilla");
    ElementParameterFilter famFilter = new ElementParameterFilter(famNameRule);
    LogicalAndFilter andFilter = new LogicalAndFilter(new List<ElementFilter> { catFilter, levelFilter, famFilter });
    doors = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).WherePasses(andFilter).ToList();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un suelo con un hueco circular en el centro. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Floor with Hole"))
{
    t.Start();
    Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
    FloorType floorType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(FloorType)).FirstOrDefault() as FloorType;

    if (level != null && floorType != null)
    {
        XYZ p1 = new XYZ(-10 / 0.3048, -10 / 0.3048, 0);
        XYZ p2 = new XYZ(10 / 0.3048, -10 / 0.3048, 0);
        XYZ p3 = new XYZ(10 / 0.3048, 10 / 0.3048, 0);
        XYZ p4 = new XYZ(-10 / 0.3048, 10 / 0.3048, 0);
        CurveLoop outerLoop = new CurveLoop();
        outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p1, p2));
        outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p2, p3));
        outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p3, p4));
        outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p4, p1));

        XYZ center = XYZ.Zero;
        double radius = 2 / 0.3048;
        CurveLoop innerLoop = new CurveLoop();
        innerLoop.Append(Arc.Create(center - XYZ.BasisX * radius, center + XYZ.BasisX * radius, center + XYZ.BasisY * radius));
        innerLoop.Append(Arc.Create(center + XYZ.BasisX * radius, center - XYZ.BasisX * radius, center - XYZ.BasisY * radius));

        Floor.Create(doc, new List<CurveLoop> { outerLoop, innerLoop }, floorType.Id, level.Id);
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

<s>[INST] Set the sill height of all windows to 1 meter. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Set Sill Height"))

<s>[INST] Crea una dimensión radial para un muro curvo. [/INST]using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Radial Dimension"))
{
    t.Start();
    Wall curvedWall = new FilteredElementCollector(doc, doc.ActiveView.Id).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).Cast<Wall>().FirstOrDefault(w => w.Location is LocationCurve && (w.Location as LocationCurve).Curve is Arc);
    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;

    if (curvedWall != null && activeView != null)
    {
        LocationCurve locCurve = curvedWall.Location as LocationCurve;
        if (locCurve != null)
        {
            Arc arc = locCurve.Curve as Arc;
            if (arc != null)
            {
                ReferenceArray refArray = new ReferenceArray();
                refArray.Append(arc.Reference);
                doc.Create.NewDimension(activeView, Line.CreateBound(arc.Center, arc.GetEndPoint(0)), refArray);
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

        }

}</s>

<s>[INST] Primero, crea un nuevo tipo de muro de 18cm llamado 'Muro Interior Acústico', y luego úsalo para crear un muro de 8m en el Nivel 1. [/INST]string newTypeName = "Muro Interior Acústico";
WallType newWallType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).Cast<WallType>().FirstOrDefault(wt => wt.Name == newTypeName) as WallType;

if (newWallType == null)
{
    WallType wallTypeToDuplicate = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).FirstOrDefault() as WallType;
    if (wallTypeToDuplicate != null)
    {
        newWallType = wallTypeToDuplicate.Duplicate(newTypeName) as WallType;
        if (newWallType != null)
        {
            CompoundStructure cs = newWallType.GetCompoundStructure();
            if (cs != null)
            {
                cs.SetLayerWidth(cs.GetFirstCoreLayerIndex(), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(0.18, UnitTypeId.Meters));
                newWallType.SetCompoundStructure(cs);
            }
        }
    }
}

if (newWallType != null)
{
    Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault(l => l.Name == "Nivel 1") as Level;
    if (level != null)
    {
        Line wallCurve = Line.CreateBound(XYZ.Zero, new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(8, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0, 0));
        double height = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(3, UnitTypeId.Meters);
        Wall.Create(doc, wallCurve, newWallType.Id, level.Id, height, 0, false, false);
    }
}</s>

    {

        SchedulableField costField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.Value == (long)BuiltInParameter.ALL_MODEL_COST);
        
        if (typeMarkField != null) def.AddField(typeMarkField);
        if (costField != null) def.AddField(costField);

}</s>

<s>[INST] Cambia el tipo de la ventana seleccionada al tipo 'Fija 120x60'. [/INST]UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
Reference pickedRef = uidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona una ventana");
FamilySymbol newType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Windows).WhereElementIsElementType().Cast<FamilySymbol>().FirstOrDefault(fs => fs.Name == "Fija 120x60");
if (pickedRef != null && newType != null)
{
    FamilyInstance window = doc.GetElement(pickedRef.ElementId) as FamilyInstance;
    if (window != null)
    {
        window.Symbol = newType;
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una apertura rectangular de 1x1 metros en el centro del suelo seleccionado. [/INST]UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
Reference pickedRef = uidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un suelo");
if (pickedRef != null)
{
    Floor floor = doc.GetElement(pickedRef.ElementId) as Floor;
    if (floor != null)
    {
        BoundingBoxXYZ bbox = floor.get_BoundingBox(null);
        XYZ center = (bbox.Min + bbox.Max) / 2.0;
        double size = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(1, UnitTypeId.Meters);
        XYZ p1 = new XYZ(center.X - size/2, center.Y - size/2, 0);
        XYZ p2 = new XYZ(center.X + size/2, center.Y - size/2, 0);
        XYZ p3 = new XYZ(center.X + size/2, center.Y + size/2, 0);
        XYZ p4 = new XYZ(center.X - size/2, center.Y + size/2, 0);
        CurveArray profile = new CurveArray();
        profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p1, p2));
        profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p2, p3));
        profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p3, p4));
        profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p4, p1));
        doc.Create.NewOpening(floor, profile, false);
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Oculta la categoría de mobiliario en la vista activa. [/INST]View activeView = doc.ActiveView;
Category furnitureCategory = doc.Settings.Categories.get_Item(BuiltInCategory.OST_Furniture);
if (activeView != null && furnitureCategory != null && furnitureCategory.get_AllowsVisibilityControl(activeView))
{

}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea los siguientes planos: 'A-101' con nombre 'Planta Baja', y 'A-102' con nombre 'Planta Alta'. [/INST]FamilySymbol titleBlock = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_TitleBlocks).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;
if (titleBlock != null)
{
    ViewSheet sheet1 = ViewSheet.Create(doc, titleBlock.Id);
    sheet1.SheetNumber = "A-101";
    sheet1.Name = "Planta Baja";
    ViewSheet sheet2 = ViewSheet.Create(doc, titleBlock.Id);
    sheet2.SheetNumber = "A-102";
    sheet2.Name = "Planta Alta";
}</s>

<s>[INST] Coloca las vistas 'Planta Nivel 1' y 'Planta Nivel 2' en el plano 'A-101'. [/INST]ViewSheet sheet = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewSheet)).Cast<ViewSheet>().FirstOrDefault(s => s.SheetNumber == "A-101");
View view1 = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewPlan)).Cast<ViewPlan>().FirstOrDefault(v => v.Name == "Planta Nivel 1");
View view2 = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewPlan)).Cast<ViewPlan>().FirstOrDefault(v => v.Name == "Planta Nivel 2");
if (sheet != null && view1 != null && view2 != null)
{
    XYZ insertPoint1 = new XYZ(1.0, 1.0, 0);
    Viewport.Create(doc, sheet.Id, view1.Id, insertPoint1);
    XYZ insertPoint2 = new XYZ(1.0, 2.0, 0);
    Viewport.Create(doc, sheet.Id, view2.Id, insertPoint2);
}</s>

<s>[INST] Añade el prefijo 'ARQ-' a todas las tablas de planificación. [/INST]string prefix = "ARQ-";
List<ViewSchedule> schedules = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewSchedule)).Cast<ViewSchedule>().Where(v => !v.IsTemplate).ToList();
foreach (ViewSchedule schedule in schedules)
{
    if (!schedule.Name.StartsWith(prefix))
    {
        schedule.Name = prefix + schedule.Name;
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Renombra todas las vistas de sección para que empiecen con 'SEC-'. [/INST]string prefix = "SEC-";
List<ViewSection> sectionViews = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewSection)).Cast<ViewSection>().Where(v => !v.IsTemplate).ToList();
foreach (ViewSection view in sectionViews)
{
    if (!view.Name.StartsWith(prefix))
    {
        view.Name = prefix + view.Name;
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea los worksets 'Arquitectura', 'Estructura' y 'MEP'. [/INST]if (doc.IsWorkshared)
{
    Workset.Create(doc, "Arquitectura");
    Workset.Create(doc, "Estructura");

}</s>

<s>[INST] Asigna todos los muros y suelos seleccionados al workset 'Estructura'. [/INST]UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
ICollection<ElementId> selectedIds = uidoc.Selection.GetElementIds();
Workset workset = new FilteredWorksetCollector(doc).OfKind(WorksetKind.UserWorkset).FirstOrDefault(ws => ws.Name == "Estructura");
if (selectedIds.Count > 0 && workset != null)
{
    int worksetId = workset.Id.IntegerValue;
    foreach (ElementId id in selectedIds)
    {
        Element elem = doc.GetElement(id);
        Parameter wsparam = elem.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.ELEM_PARTITION_PARAM);
        if (wsparam != null && !wsparam.IsReadOnly) wsparam.Set(worksetId);
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Fija (pin) todos los vínculos de Revit en el proyecto. [/INST]List<RevitLinkInstance> links = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(RevitLinkInstance)).Cast<RevitLinkInstance>().ToList();
foreach (RevitLinkInstance link in links)
{
    if (!link.Pinned)
    {
        link.Pinned = true;
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Pin all selected elements. [/INST]UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
ICollection<ElementId> selectedIds = uidoc.Selection.GetElementIds();
if (selectedIds.Count > 0)
{
    foreach (ElementId id in selectedIds)
    {
        Element elem = doc.GetElement(id);
        if (elem != null && !elem.Pinned)
        {
            elem.Pinned = true;
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Cambia el parámetro 'Función' de todos los muros seleccionados a 'Interior'. [/INST]UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
ICollection<ElementId> selectedIds = uidoc.Selection.GetElementIds();
if (selectedIds.Count > 0)
{

    {
        Wall wall = doc.GetElement(id) as Wall;

<s>[INST] Conecta dos tuberías seleccionadas por el usuario con un codo. [/INST]UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
Reference ref1 = uidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Select the first pipe");
Reference ref2 = uidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Select the second pipe");

<s>[INST] Calcula el volumen total de hormigón de todas las zapatas de cimentación. [/INST]double totalVolume = 0.0;
List<FamilyInstance> footings = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralFoundation).WhereElementIsNotElementType().Cast<FamilyInstance>().ToList();
foreach (FamilyInstance footing in footings)
{
    Parameter volumeParam = footing.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.HOST_VOLUME_COMPUTED);
    if (volumeParam != null && volumeParam.HasValue)
    {
        totalVolume += volumeParam.AsDouble();
    }
}
// El volumen está en pies cúbicos. El orquestador puede convertirlo a metros cúbicos.</s>

<s>[INST] Encuentra el muro con la marca 'M-01' y cambia su comentario a 'Muro de carga principal'. [/INST]string markValue = "M-01";
ElementId markParamId = new ElementId(BuiltInParameter.ALL_MODEL_MARK);
ParameterValueProvider pvp = new ParameterValueProvider(markParamId);
FilterStringRuleEvaluator evaluator = new FilterStringEquals();
FilterRule rule = new FilterStringRule(pvp, evaluator, markValue);
ElementParameterFilter filter = new ElementParameterFilter(rule);
Wall wall = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Walls).WherePasses(filter).FirstOrDefault() as Wall;
if (wall != null)
{
    Parameter commentParam = wall.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.ALL_MODEL_INSTANCE_COMMENTS);
    if (commentParam != null && !commentParam.IsReadOnly)
    {
        commentParam.Set("Muro de carga principal");
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Añade refuerzo tipo estribo a la viga seleccionada. [/INST]UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
Reference beamRef = uidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Select a beam");
RebarBarType barType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(RebarBarType)).FirstOrDefault() as RebarBarType;
RebarShape stirrupShape = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(RebarShape)).Cast<RebarShape>().FirstOrDefault(s => s.RebarStyle == RebarStyle.StirrupTie);
if (beamRef != null && barType != null && stirrupShape != null)
{
    FamilyInstance beam = doc.GetElement(beamRef) as FamilyInstance;
    if (beam != null)
    {
        Rebar.CreateFromRebarShape(doc, stirrupShape, barType, beam, beam.GetTransform().Origin, XYZ.BasisX, XYZ.BasisY);
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea una losa de cimentación estructural de 40cm de espesor. [/INST]Level foundationLevel = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).Cast<Level>().OrderBy(l => l.Elevation).FirstOrDefault();
FloorType slabTypeToDuplicate = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(FloorType)).Cast<FloorType>().FirstOrDefault(ft => ft.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.FLOOR_PARAM_IS_STRUCTURAL).AsInteger() == 1);
if(slabTypeToDuplicate != null && foundationLevel != null)
{
    string newTypeName = "Losa Cimentación 40cm";
    FloorType newSlabType = slabTypeToDuplicate.Duplicate(newTypeName) as FloorType;
    if(newSlabType != null)
    {
        CompoundStructure cs = newSlabType.GetCompoundStructure();
        if (cs != null)
        {
            cs.SetLayerWidth(cs.GetFirstCoreLayerIndex(), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(40, UnitTypeId.Centimeters));
            newSlabType.SetCompoundStructure(cs);
            XYZ p1 = new XYZ(0,0,0); XYZ p2 = new XYZ(10,0,0); XYZ p3 = new XYZ(10,10,0); XYZ p4 = new XYZ(0,10,0);
            CurveLoop profile = new CurveLoop();
            profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p1,p2)); profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p2,p3)); profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p3,p4)); profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p4,p1));
            Floor.Create(doc, new List<CurveLoop>{profile}, newSlabType.Id, foundationLevel.Id);
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Conecta dos conductos con una unión en T. [/INST]List<Duct> ducts = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Duct)).Cast<Duct>().ToList();
if (ducts.Count >= 2)
{
    Connector c1 = ducts[0].ConnectorManager.UnusedConnectors.Cast<Connector>().FirstOrDefault();
    Connector c2 = ducts[1].ConnectorManager.UnusedConnectors.Cast<Connector>().FirstOrDefault();
    if (c1 != null && c2 != null)
    {
        // CORRECCIÓN: El método correcto es NewUnionFitting, no NewTeeFitting para una conexión simple.
        doc.Create.NewUnionFitting(c1, c2);
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] Crea un nuevo parámetro de proyecto compartido de texto llamado 'Notas Adicionales' para muros y puertas. [/INST]string paramName = "Notas Adicionales";
string originalFile = doc.Application.SharedParametersFilename;
string tempFile = System.IO.Path.GetTempFileName() + ".txt";
using (System.IO.File.Create(tempFile)) { }
doc.Application.SharedParametersFilename = tempFile;
try
{
    DefinitionFile defFile = doc.Application.OpenSharedParameterFile();
    if (defFile != null)
    {
        DefinitionGroup group = defFile.Groups.Create("General");
        if (group != null)
        {
            ExternalDefinitionCreationOptions options = new ExternalDefinitionCreationOptions(paramName, SpecTypeId.String.Text);
            Definition definition = group.Definitions.Create(options);
            if (definition != null)
            {
                CategorySet categories = doc.Application.Create.NewCategorySet();
                categories.Insert(doc.Settings.Categories.get_Item(BuiltInCategory.OST_Walls));
                categories.Insert(doc.Settings.Categories.get_Item(BuiltInCategory.OST_Doors));
                InstanceBinding binding = doc.Application.Create.NewInstanceBinding(categories);
                doc.ParameterBindings.Insert(definition, binding, GroupTypeId.Data);
            }
        }
    }
}
finally
{
    doc.Application.SharedParametersFilename = originalFile;
    System.IO.File.Delete(tempFile);
}</s>

<s>[INST] Inserta un terminal de aire en el extremo de un conducto. [/INST]Duct duct = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Duct)).FirstOrDefault() as Duct;
FamilySymbol terminalSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_DuctTerminal).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;
if (duct != null && terminalSymbol != null)
{
    if(!terminalSymbol.IsActive) terminalSymbol.Activate();
    LocationCurve locCurve = duct.Location as LocationCurve;
    if (locCurve != null)
    {
        Connector endConnector = duct.ConnectorManager.UnusedConnectors.Cast<Connector>().FirstOrDefault(c => c.Origin.IsAlmostEqualTo(locCurve.Curve.GetEndPoint(1)));
        if (endConnector != null)
        {
            doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(endConnector.Origin, terminalSymbol, duct, StructuralType.NonStructural);
        }
    }
}</s>
